title: SOA-based reservoir computing using up-sampling
authors:
E. Manuylovich, A.E. Bednyakova, D.A. Ivoilov, I.S. Terekhov, S.K.
  Turitsyn
abstract:
We introduce a new approach to reservoir computing based on up-sampling and
modulation, utilizing semiconductor optical amplifier and photodetector as
nonlinear elements without conventionally used delay loop. We demonstrated the
400-step prediction capability of the proposed scheme for the Mackey-Glass time
series test.
